crochet terms chain s chain/chains slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet decrease- single_crochet two together st s - stitch/stitches round s round/rounds beg beginning blo back loop only materials approximately 110-120 yards size 5 bulky yarn 3oz /85g 144 yd/132m i prefer lion brand tweed stripes one skein should be enough results will vary depending on yarn used l11/8mm crochet hook or size to meet gauge k10 5/6 5mm crochet hook for band on adult size only tapestry needle flexible measuring tape gauge working in row first 3 rounds in pattern = 3 ½ inches with l hook please be sure to check your gauge before starting as gauge can vary greatly from person to person and depending on the yarn used adjusting to meet gauge if your gauge doesn t match chances are your project will turn out smaller or larger than the size intended do not get discouraged many people crochet with different tensions even when using the same yarn or hook size suggested there are many adjustments that can be made to resolve this if you continue to have problems after trying the tips below please contact me i am more than happy to make adjustments and offer other suggestions to make the pattern work for you my email address is simplymadebyerin@gmail com 1 if the item is too small try going up a hook size or two if it s too big go down a hook size or two 2 when available try working the pattern instructions for the next size up or down 3 add or subtract increase or decrease row/rounds this can be tricky on certain patterns therefore i only suggest doing this if you are comfortable in making these adjustments on your own doing this may interfere with the remainder of the pattern and change the stitch count throughout size women s hat is one size fits most made to fit an average woman s size head approximately 21-23 inches children s size fits approximately 3t-10 years adjust hook size up or down to adjust hat size slightly smaller or larger you can also add or subtract increase rounds if you are unable to get the proper size you are looking for this will change the stitch count throughout to make the hat extra slouchy add extra rounds before starting the decrease round for the brim special notes each round not including round 1 starts
